name: Tiny Story 1 adventure
description:
In one of the cutest, most unique and interesting point and click adventure games, you need to solve the Tiny Island puzzles. Simply choose your favorite hero among several interesting ones and have fun. In TinyStory Adventure PointClick you need to check what really happened in your favorite cool town and why the guards of Rhino Island invade it. Colorful, unique and entertaining, you’ll want to explore this lovely adventure all the time.

UNIQUE ARTWORK, COOL & FUN CHARACTERS
Check out: Barry, Lizzy, Barry, Mimy and Wolfy, our cool and funny characters. Play with these interesting and explore houses, nature, characters, items and much more in one of the cutest and neatest graphics you’ve seen in a point n click adventure games.

START AN AMAZING JOURNEY ON THE ISLAND
You will be surprised of where this adventure puzzler can take you. The storyline is so creative and the actions you need to do are so surprising that you will want to explore and practically be glued to your device. The Tiny Island is filled with stunning and exhilarating locations. Point and click has never been more exciting and thrilling!

TRY THE DEMO, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS
Try the demo to understand the game and see how this point and click adventure game really works. Then you can continue with the game. In an adventure game setting you need to check how everything works and how to make use of the game features. See why we have been rated as one of the best adventure games.

TINYSTORY ADVENTURE POINTCLICK FEATURES
- 5 ultra-cool characters
- really fun and well thought online point and click adventure
- exquisite unique graphics and artwork
- tons of locations, places and items to be explored
- ad free
------------------------------------------------
Try a great new adventure game and enjoy it for hours!
